---
title: "Operators Reference"
---

AlphaLab provides 68 operators aligned with WorldQuant BRAIN.

See the [full operator reference](../operators.qmd) for complete documentation.

## Categories

- **Time-Series (26)**: `ts_mean`, `ts_delta`, `ts_rank`, etc.
- **Cross-Sectional (7)**: `rank`, `zscore`, `scale`, etc.
- **Group (6)**: `group_rank`, `group_neutralize`, etc.
- **Arithmetic (15)**: `add`, `multiply`, `abs`, `log`, etc.
- **Logical (11)**: `if_else`, `and_`, `or_`, etc.
- **Transformational (1)**: `trade_when`
- **Vector (2)**: `vec_avg`, `vec_sum`

## Quick Examples

```python
# Time-series: 5-day momentum
ts_delta(close, 5)

# Cross-sectional: rank across all stocks
rank(-returns)

# Group: neutralize by sector
group_neutralize(close, sector)

# Conditional: only trade when volume is high
trade_when(volume > adv20, rank(returns), -1)
```
